column4: what are some must get package? flashplayer-nonfree, xchat, ubuntu-restricted-extras, what else?
the problem is im a nub (installed ubuntu today for the first time. linux for the first time, really).
i dont know what i need
after some time u get lazy to boot to windows
especially if u have Vista (like me)
what all do u use your laptop for anyway...can give u some suggestions
hmm... install APTonCD, helps when u need to reinstall
reinstall all downloaded applications in case u need to reinstall the OS
saved my life a couple of times when i did some stupid stuff ;)
that could be because u dont have some plugin?
no idea... but u could try using Virtualbox
It gives u chat and alerts on mail
